message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your concerns, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $14000? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $16000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that this is your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more attempt to meet in the middle. Would you be willing to consider $15500? This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer. I'm going to hold firm at $16000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other offers.
